original_title: Sri Lanka rupee close at 306.50/307.25 against the USD, bond yields down
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT- Sri Lanka’s bond yields were end lower on Thursday and the rupee closed at 306.50/307.25 against the US dollar in the spot market, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.09.2027 closed at 26.30/27.00 percent, down from 27.25/75 percent at Wednesday’s close.
A bond maturing on 01.05.2025 closed at 28.00/29.00 percent, down from 29.00/50 per cent at last close.
The rupee closed at 306.50/307.25 against the US dollar in the spot market steady from yesterday’s close at 305.80/306.20. (Colombo/May18/2023)
